reviewText: Thank you for responding efficiently. Very Informative!!!

Charlie engages key issues concerning the truth of what really happened exposing the reasons for Dan's disclaimer on the copyright page of his book ... and I quote... "This book is a work of fiction.  Names, characters, businesses, organizations, places, events, and incidents either are the product of the author's imagination or are used fictitiously.  Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, events, or locales is entirely coincidental".  Buy the DVD and see for yourself.
